set.name: Duel Decks: Ajani vs. Nicol Bolas

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you gain life, put that many +1/+1 counters on Ageless Entity.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tel-Jilad's sworn protectors are the trolls, yet more fearsome protectors were created by the Tangle itself.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker {1}{R} (You may pay an additional {1}{R} as you cast this spell.) Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. If Agonizing Demise was kicked, it deals damage equal to that creature's power to the creature's controller.

property.name: Rules
property.value: +1: Target permanent doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step. -2: Ajani Vengeant deals 3 damage to target creature or player and you gain 3 life. -7: Destroy all lands target player controls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He hasn't returned to the Cloud Forest. But I can still sense his calming presence."—Zaliki of Naya

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you gain life, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Ajani's Pridemate. (For example, if an effect causes you to gain 3 life, you may put one +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When one of us prospers, the pride prospers."—Jazal Goldmane

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has lifelink and trample. Equip {3}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "May this grant you all the strength of the behemoths and none of their serenity."—Ajani

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, haste Whenever Blazing Specter deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Brackwater Elemental attacks or blocks, sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step. Unearth {2}{U} ({2}{U}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash When Briarhorn enters the battlefield, target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Evoke {1}{G} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Relative of yours?" Ertai teased. Mirri simply sneered.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target noncreature spell. Its controller loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The essence of every world, every spell, and every thought is power. Nothing else matters, because nothing else exists."—Nicol Bolas

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent sacrifices a creature, discards three cards, then loses 5 life. You return a creature card from your graveyard to your hand, draw three cards, then gain 5 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is always a greater power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Crumbling Necropolis enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U}, {B}, or {R} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They say the ruins of Sedraxis were once a shining capital in Vithia. Now it is a blight, a place to be avoided by the living."—Olcot, Rider of Joffik

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player draws two cards. Flashback—{1}{U}, Pay 3 life. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No fact escapes me. Why do you think you can?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Dimir Cutpurse deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card and you draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Other guilds demand tolls from those who travel their territories, but not House Dimir. It takes its share secretly, one coin purse at a time.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has flying. Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to a player, that player discards two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Taste his power, hunger for his command.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The more our numbers grow, the more I gain hope that Volrath and his cursed stronghold will one day fall."—Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every world is an organism, able to grow new lands. Some just do it faster than others.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike Unearth {U}{B}{R} ({U}{B}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, first strike At the beginning of your upkeep, if Firemane Angel is in your graveyard or on the battlefield, you may gain 1 life. {6}{R}{R}{W}{W}: Return Firemane Angel from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash When Fleetfoot Panther enters the battlefield, return a green or white creature you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Graypelt Refuge enters the battlefield tapped. When Graypelt Refuge enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't be fooled. If it were as docile as it looks, it would've died off long ago."—Yon Basrel, Oran-Rief survivalist

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying. When enchanted creature dies, put a 2/2 white Griffin creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one — Return target permanent to its owner's hand; or target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn; or creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "So many choices. Shall I choose loathing, hate, or malice today?"—Eliza of the Keep

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if that player has two or fewer cards in hand, Hellfire Mongrel deals 2 damage to him or her.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is no fondness between the hound and its master. There is only a common appreciation of the hunt.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, {T}: Tap target artifact, creature, or land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In fire there is the spark of chaos and destruction, the seed of life. In ice there is perfect tranquility, perfect order, and the silence of death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Swampcycling {2}, mountaincycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Swamp or Mountain card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{G}: Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We are one with the wild things. Life blooms from our fingertips and nature responds to our summons."—Jade creed

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) Islandcycling {2}, swampcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for an Island or Swamp card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Jungle Shrine enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R}, {G}, or {W} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On Naya, ambition and treachery are scarce, hunted nearly to extinction by the awe owed to terrestrial gods.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kazandu Refuge enters the battlefield tapped. When Kazandu Refuge enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kird Ape gets +1/+2 as long as you control a Forest.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Apes can be gentle, contemplative beasts—but context is everything.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal any number of creature cards from among them and put the revealed cards into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lightning Helix deals 3 damage to target creature or player and you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Rage is not the answer. Rage followed by fitting vengeance is the answer."—Ajani

property.name: Rules
property.value: Loam Lion gets +1/+2 as long as you control a Forest.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In Zendikar, today's grassland could be tomorrow's jungle, and hunting grounds change as quickly as the weather.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Loxodon Hierarch enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life. {G}{W}, Sacrifice Loxodon Hierarch: Regenerate each creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have lived long, and I remember how this city once was. If my death serves to bring back the Ravnica in my memory, then so be it."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Looks like we're completely outnumbered.""Lucky for us. I thought we'd be bored."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Morgue Toad: Add {U}{R} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The toads of Urborg aren't fast, powerful, or pleasant, but they have their uses."—Ertai

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Touched by moroii"—Undercity slang meaning "to grow old"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance {R}, {T}: Target creature can't block this turn. {G}, {T}: Target creature blocks this turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We must hunt and kill the dragon before it can return to raze our ancient city."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one — Naya Charm deals 3 damage to target creature; or return target card from a graveyard to its owner's hand; or tap all creatures target player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Deep in nature's core lies a potential unsullied by greed or civilization.

property.name: Rules
property.value: +3: Destroy target noncreature permanent. -2: Gain control of target creature. -9: Nicol Bolas, Planeswalker deals 7 damage to target player. That player discards seven cards, then sacrifices seven permanents.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Blue spells and red spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. {1}{B}: Regenerate Nightscape Familiar.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nightscape masters don't stop at raising the spirit of a fallen battlemage. They raise the flesh along with it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {U}, {B}, or {R} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like most features of Grixis, the obelisks that remain from the time of Alara now exist only for dark exploitation.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Ogre Savant enters the battlefield, if {U} was spent to cast Ogre Savant, return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: You may have Pride of Lions assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There's only one thing worse than a hungry lion—many hungry lions.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose two — Target player loses X life; or return target creature card with converted mana cost X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield; or target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn; or up to X target creatures gain fear until end of turn. (They can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) {1}, Sacrifice Qasali Pridemage: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An elder in one pride, of the Sigiled caste in another.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target permanent to its owner's hand. Then that player discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Anything sent into a plagued world is bound to come back infected.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kithkin somnomancers enjoy the peaceful dreams wafting from their victims.

property.name: Color
Rules
Rules
property.value: Rupture Spire enters the battlefield tapped. When Rupture Spire enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you pay {1}. {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ({T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.) Sapseep Forest enters the battlefield tapped. {G}, {T}: You gain 1 life. Activate this ability only if you control two or more green permanents.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you gain life, you may pay {2}. If you do, Searing Meditation deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When I meditate I see the world as it should be. All that does not fit, I remove."—Alovnek, Boros guildmage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) When Shriekmaw enters the battlefield, destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. Evoke {1}{B} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain control of target creature. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nicol Bolas doesn't distinguish between servants and victims.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Slavering Nulls deals combat damage to a player, if you control a Swamp, you may have that player discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Having lost their minds, they now want yours.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Whenever Spitemare is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I knew a creature carved from a dream of wild freedom. Any attempt to leash or exploit it failed, and at terrible cost."—Ashling

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Steamcore Weird enters the battlefield, if {R} was spent to cast Steamcore Weird, it deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like many Izzet creations, weirds are based on wild contradictions yet somehow manage to work.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Surveilling Sprite dies, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Their natural curiosity, combined with a knack for trespassing, makes sprites excellent spies.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player gains 8 life. Basic landcycling {1}{G} ({1}{G}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some who scouted new lands chose to stay.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Sylvan Ranger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Not all paths are found on the forest floor."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice Terramorphic Expanse: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Take two steps north into the unsettled future, south into the unquiet past, east into the present day, or west into the great unknown.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until end of turn, creatures you control get +5/+5 and gain first strike, lifelink, and trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Retribution is best delivered by claws and rage, with both magnified."—Ajani

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. Its controller loses 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Which would you like first, the insult or the injury?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Its controller loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This creature is inadequate. Send it to the splicers for innovation."—Malcator, Executor of Synthesis

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. {2}{G}{W}, {T}: Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the autumn, she casts her seeds across the streets below, and come spring, her children rise in service to the Conclave.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Wild Nacatl gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Mountain. Wild Nacatl gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Plains.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Cloud Nacatl sit and think, a bunch of soft paws. We are the Claws of Marisi, stalking, pouncing, drawing blood."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One of the most ferocious and deadly gargantuans, the thoctar never sees its worshippers, but it often awakens surrounded by gifts and sacrifices.
